channel.title: CVE Feed for OMRON -- CX-Programmer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OMRON -- CX-Programmer

item.title: CVE-2022-2979|2024-09-17T02:37:34.673Z -- omron -- cx-programmer
item.description: Opening a specially crafted file could cause the affected product to fail to release its memory reference potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-3397|2024-09-17T04:03:42.308Z -- omron -- cx-programmer
item.description: OMRON CX-Programmer 9.78 and prior is vulnerable to an Out-of-Bounds Write, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
